channel.title: stochastic-optimal-control on Abraham P. Vinod
channel.description: Recent content in stochastic-optimal-control on Abraham P. Vinod

item.title: SReachTools: A MATLAB Toolbox for stochastic reachability computation
item.description: A repeatability-tested, open-source, MATLAB toolbox for scalable stochastic reachability computation for stochastic linear systems

item.title: Safety under uncertainty and constraints
item.description: Providing guarantees of safety and synthesis of admissible controllers for stochastic dynamical systems using optimization, Fourier transforms, and computational geometry

item.title: Stochastic motion planning via probabilistic occupancy function
item.description: A sampling-free estimation of collision probability and motion planning using successive convexification

item.title: Stochastic target capture via forward stochastic reachability
item.description: A grid-free, recursion-free, and sampling-free estimation of events with convexity guarantees

item.title: Probabilistic occupancy via forward stochastic reachability
item.description: A grid-free, recursion-free, and sampling-free estimation of events with convexity guarantees
